title: Is Ariana Grande a nice person? - Quora

response.answer_text: I know many people are going to come for me but this is my opinion. I personally think she is not that nice. Let me explain… In 2015, she went to a doughnut shop and licked the doughnut without paying for it and said she ‘hated america’. She was caught doing this on camera but she later apologised. It doesn’t stop there. *Please Scroll to the bottom of the post before y'all comment about the donut scandal* In 2018, Kris Wu’s album debuted 1st on Billboard 100, passing Ariana’s Thank, U next. Her fans started rumours saying that he used bots and someone later contacted Ariana’s manager. He posted a tweet saying :  Then, posted:  For those people who don't know who Kris Wu is, he was a former member of EXO. He has collaborated with famous western artists such as Travis Scott,(their song called ‘Deserve’) Jhené Aiko, (song called Freedom) Rich the Kid, (Coupe) Trippie Redd, (18) and with Canadian record producer, Murda Beatz on their collab, Novermber Rain. Kris Wu is Burberry’s first Chinese ambassador in 2017 and Louis Vuitton’s ambassador in 2018. Her fans started calling him out and one fan called Kris Wu “ugly yellow sushi roll”. This offended many Asian people including non-Kris Wu fans and Kris Wu fans. This is the 21st century and racism is not supported. Ari didn’t apologise to him. Ari even liked the tweet. This is why I have stopped supporting her even though I still listen to her songs. Yes, she is the one of the most famous and best singers in the world, she should’ve apologised to Kris on behalf of her fans. Ariana needs to stop thinking she is the best and that she will forever be the 1st and all this fame has gone to her head. Ariana’s fan base is really toxic and too rude. Edit: I never expected this much views and upvotes!! Edit 2: Before anyone comments about the whole 'donut scandal' please know that someone has already explained that she was heavy on anesthesia. I know that some people might not like her for doing this and I can't say anything on that. I understand why people were upset and annoyed at her for this but she was simply not herself. Edit 3: Thank you for 1.1k upvotes lmao ❤️ Edit 4: tysm for all the people who has either shared or upvoted this. this means a lot to me, especially since this is my most viewed answer 💕 sylvia ~ 😌🦋

i mean, there’s no certain answer if anybody is bad or good. especially a celebrity. as a fan, of course i’ll say she’s good but if she’s not your type, you probably wouldn’t. somebody can’t be “good” or “bad”, it just depends on your interpretation. i find her nice since she’s shown kindness and compassion many times, even when she was going through a lot. 15k dollars to a fan to pay for college. saying she loves her fans everyday on twitter. paying for fans’ meals many times. one love manchester. she’s done many things with good intentions several times and is dedicated to her fans which makes me love and support her. however, that doesn’t define her as a person. she’s a celebrity so many people know and form an opinion on her. i’m not saying it’s right to make disrespectful comments judging her because all celebrities are human beings like us and you don’t have a right to insult them any more than another person. but people like her are prone to controversy so you’ll see several viewpoints on her. none of us know her personally so ultimately we can’t judge her 100%. what i’d suggest is finding out on your own. there’s people that like her and people that don’t. watch her interviews, listen to her songs, check her social medias. we all have different types of people that we prefer which shapes our opinions. so if you want an answer to this question, decide what YOU think of her :)
